title: Problem 2081_A
statement: Ecrade has an integer x. He will show you this number in the form of a binary number of length n.There are two kinds of operations. Replace x with ≤ft\lfloor \dfrac{x}{2}\right\rfloor, where ≤ft\lfloor \dfrac{x}{2}\right\rfloor is the greatest integer ≤ \dfrac{x}{2}. Replace x with ≤ft\lceil \dfrac{x}{2}\right\rceil, where ≤ft\lceil \dfrac{x}{2}\right\rceil is the smallest integer ≥ \dfrac{x}{2}. Ecrade will perform several operations until x becomes 1.
